page.title: 14LOCAL TRADITIONS IN SABDEN
page.content: There are several annual{customs}in Sabden.The main{customs}are the markets and the{halloween pageant. There are also{Christmas}events at each of the churches.There is a {halloween}trek up Pendle Hill which has been a tradition for many years. There is a new{custom}just started about keeping{Sabden}tidy and the schools enter a poster competition in {Sabden}held every year in{September. According to our own survey{67%}of the people interviewed said they enjoyed the organised events on{Halloween. however{70%}protested at the invasion of sightseers who walk around the countryside.There are organised dances in the church hall and private functions in the countryside. { {JOHN PHILIP BACKHOUSE,MATTHEW HARPER.
